Text:
Thank you!!!!
Lost the whole serie in a HDD crash not long ago :'( :'(
@TheWierd86 no prob, and i feel ya on HDD fails :/ but glad you were able to restore this anime in your collection :D

If you want to see the WHOLE series, don't miss out on Battle Stage 2 thats released after this torrent was made. 
http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=anime&aid=6129
You can find it here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4181801/Initial_D_Battle_Stage_2_DVDrip_J.C.team
(Though you have to get subs by yourself apparently)

i thought this was all subs? but its Dubed? i clicked on one of the episodes on stage 1 and its Dubed 
>.<
@JessyL it has both english and japanese audio. you just need a player that can enable you to choose which audio file you want to play (i used Zoom Player)
